structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Clerks, Attorneys And Other Officers Of Judicial Courts

law.catch_line: Obsolete Or Useless Papers; Disposition, Destruction Or Storage

text.section: Any cause to which the papers relate, if they relate to a cause, shall have been finally disposed of for more than twenty years, and any criminal complaint which shall have been disposed of by being placed on file, as provided in section thirty-eight of chapter two hundred and eighteen, and shall have remained on file for more than twenty years.
No original paper bearing date or known to have been filed earlier than the year eighteen hundred shall be destroyed.
Reasonable notice to the public shall be given before any such disposal is made of any paper.
